description.value:
You intentionally take your innovation beyond normal safety limits, making it explode and damage nearby creatures without damaging the innovation... hopefully. The explosion deals @Damage[max(2, @actor.level)d6[@actor.flags.pf2e.inventor.explode]|traits:area-damage] damage with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.inventor.value)|basic:true] to all creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5] around you (if you're wearing or holding the innovation) or around your innovation (if your innovation is a minion).

At 3rd level, and every level thereafter, increase your explosion's damage by 1d6.

If you have the breakthrough innovation class feature, you can choose either a 5-foot or @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] for the area when you use Explode; if you have the revolutionary innovation class feature, you can choose a 5-foot, 10-foot, or @Template[type:emanation|distance:15].
